todos.title: Screen Savers
todos.body: Use screen savers to build a connection.

todos.title: Remembering names
todos.body: Repeat name, think of celebrity with name, rhyme name, ask origin, ask story about name, make association with first letter, focus on persons face.

todos.title: Power Pockets
todos.body: Places where connections and relationships are in high gear.

todos.title: Listen
todos.body: You need to know what is important to people.

todos.title: Sharing
todos.body: When you build software, the more you share the better it is.

todos.title: Relaxed
todos.body: When you are relaxed others will be relaxed.  Make sure to be prepared.  Tell real stories.

todos.title: Time Waster Audit
todos.body: What is wasting your time.

todos.title: Consumer
todos.body: Taking away from the community with consumption.

todos.title: Fun
todos.body: Stop proving how smart you are and have some fun.

todos.title: Change Your Life
todos.body: Shake up your routine and explore new opportunities.

todos.title: Google+
todos.body: Place to post content.

todos.title: Connection Health
todos.body: People who are connected live longer and are healthier.

todos.title: Stories
todos.body: People remember how you make them feel, not what you say.  President Clinton is the best storyteller.  Watch Ted talks.

todos.title: Connections
todos.body: People connect via values and interests.

todos.title: Hub Players
todos.body: People at the center of the social or business sphere.

todos.title: Swearing
todos.body: Never swear.

todos.title: Story
todos.body: Make it as relatable as possible.

todos.title: Unproductive Cure
todos.body: Listen to music or exercise.

todos.title: Relationship Building
todos.body: Helping others when you don't expect anything in return.  Give, Give, Get.  The best gift you can give someone is believing in them.

todos.title: Transparency
todos.body: Don't play games.

todos.title: Geographical Relationships
todos.body: Don't forget that geography has a huge effect on connecting to the people you want to meet.

todos.title: Small Actions
todos.body: Don't be disturbed if you don't have all the answers at once.  Move forward in small actions until you do.

todos.title: Relationship Tips
todos.body: Admit faults, be honest, take high road, show up, value relationships, invest in relationships, practice clear communication, don't forget to say small words of appreciation, understand you can only control your actions, not others.

todos.title: Producer
todos.body: Actively building the collective community.  Actively creates content, services and products to support passion.
